preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 80 grams of bismuth, 160 grams of neodymium, and 75 grams of lead using a precision scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry container, combine the three metals. 
 3. Use a dry mixing method to ensure an even distribution of the metals. Stir thoroughly for 5-10 minutes.
